title: From Bops to Beignets, How Christina Milian Does it All
description:
Nora chats with musician singer/songwriter, actor and entrepreneur Christina Milian for a special bonus episode! She co-founded Beignet Box in 2019 starting with a pop-up location in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. Beignet Box has since expanded with two brick and mortar locations in California and two food trucks. Christina talks about her partnership with the California Strawberry Commission, her pivot to entrepreneurship, future business goals and how she deals with burnout.

Host: Nora Ali
Producer: Bella Hutchins 
Video Editors: McKenzie Marshall and Christie Muldoon
Production, Mixing & Sound Design: Daniel Markus
Music: Daniel Markus & Breakmaster Cylinder
Fact Checker: Kate Brandt 
Senior Producer: Katherine Milsop
VP, Head of Multimedia: Sarah Singer 

Full transcripts for all Business Casual episodes available at https://businesscasual.fm
itunes:author: Morning Brew
itunes:subtitle: Plus: Her recipe for strawberry dipping sauce!
